edu.utexas.cs.tamerProject.environments.robotarm
Class RobotArmState

java.lang.Object
  edu.utexas.cs.tamerProject.environments.robotarm.RobotArmState

public class RobotArmState
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages all of the problem parameters, current state variables, and state transition and reward dynamics.

Author:
Brad Knox
